first_para: Andrew Sawford (born 15 March 1976) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament for Corby since a 2012 by-election.

full.extract: Andrew Sawford (born 15 March 1976) is a British Labour and Co-operative Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament for Corby since a 2012 by-election.
full.title: Andy Sawford
